des: "A syrup to be used in place of maple syrup on pancakes or French toast. It's awesome and not too sweet."
ins: Heat the beer in a saucepan over medium-high heat, stirring constantly, until it comes to a boil; allow to boil until the beer thickens to almost the consistency of a glaze, about 15 minutes. Stir the butter into the beer until the butter melts. Use immediately.
